name: supascan
description: Security analysis tool for Supabase databases

scripts.build: bun run build:binary && bun run build:bundle
scripts.build:binary: bun run lint && bun build --compile --minify --outfile dist/supascan ./index.ts
scripts.build:bundle: bun run lint && bun build --target node --outfile dist/supascan.js ./index.ts
